metadata.title: CVE-2016-1541 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the zip_read_mac_metadata function inarchive_read_support_format_zip.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted entry-size values in a ZIParchive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2').
